SessionComponent::read ( $  name = null  ) 

read value(s) from the session container. returns all currently set values if called with null returns null when nothing could be found under the name you gave

SessionComponent::startupSession (  )  [protected]

setting some ini-parameters and starting the actual session. is done lazy (only when needed)

Parameters:
